item.title: Puzzling New York Times
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description: Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of Games and Puzzles There once was a game called Wordle, That kept all the minds in a circle. Letter Boxed they’d play, And Spelling Bee all day, Even connections had them in a hurdle. These are the headlines that were used to create this post: Wordle Letter Boxed Spelling Bee Connections Connections Companion
